This might mean making deals, forging partnerships, broadening business relationships, or performing government outreach. . Always stay alive.'' Brian Finneran doesn't argue with Michael Vick 's own self-description of the quarterback's Falcons years. ''Mike always worked hard on the football field,'' Brian Finneran said. But as a quarterback, you've got to know everything about that offense, about the line, where the running backs are supposed to be. No question he could have worked harder in the film study room. It's been said before. I think he did the first couple of years, then got a little lax. Asked to choose his best game of the season, Michael Vick selected the playoff game against the Packers, despite three sacks, an interception on the final throw and a season-ending loss. Honestly, it might sound crazy, but( the Packers game) I just felt so much confidence, Michael Vick told PFW. ''I was just so in tune with everything: the protection, the blitz, where it was coming from, all my progressions, where everybody was supposed to be lined up.
